channel.title: How to monitor staff commands? [PI]
channel.description:
How can i monitor what commands my staff use? is there anywhere it should defaultly be stored, or how do i go about making commands record.
thanks

item.title: How to monitor staff commands? [PI]

item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

I could not provide with such files as it would not work. I could help you make it work.
Will be easier done on teamviewer, add me on msn, sambob95@live.co.uk

item.title: How to monitor staff commands? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

Yes, it will be called commands2, it will record all commands performed, not just staff commands, i suppose you could replicate it but make it save staff commands only in a commands3 text file.

Read full topic
